message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This remarkable item holds significant value to me and is worth $1,500,000 to me personally. Given its importance, I am offering it to you at a special price tailored to your needs. Considering its worth to you is $1,200,000, I propose we negotiate a fair price that reflects both our interests. Let's aim for a mutually beneficial agreement that could be closer to the $1,200,000 mark. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you have any suggestions for a price that would work for both of us. Looking forward to your response.
